bpp
===

# Available modules


The overview below shows which bpp installations are available per HPC-UGent Tier-2 cluster, ordered based on software version (new to old).

To start using bpp, load one of these modules using a `module load` command like:

```shell
module load bpp/4.4.0-GCC-10.3.0
```
